main.name: Andrew Layendecker
main.description: Interested in making peoples lives easier and bringing ideas to life
main.bio: Web Developer with a CompTia A+ certification and a certificate in Full Stack development from SMU. Holds a B.A. in Psychology and Communications, which provided me with strong skills in interpersonal communication. These communication skills served me well as my time as a mental-health paraprofessional for children, a martial arts instructor and a special education teacher. I bring several years of technical experience in working with computers in retail, small business, and personal settings. Quick learner inspired by self-growth. I find great satisfaction in creating things that make people's lives easier and have many strong interests across software and web development including information technologies, project management, and cybersecurity.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to send me an email if you have any inquiries

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
